title: Minimal Military Presence
description: In 2020, only 0.02% of Haiti's total labor force was involved in the armed forces, indicating a minimal military presence compared to global standards.

title: Negligible Military Spending
description: Haiti allocated just 0.05% of its GDP to military expenditure in 2023, reflecting one of the lowest military spending rates worldwide.

title: Low Iodized Salt Consumption
description: In 2017, only 7.5% of households in Haiti consumed iodized salt, highlighting a significant public health concern regarding nutritional deficiencies.

title: High Rate of Female-Headed Households
description: As of 2017, 45.1% of households in Haiti were headed by females, one of the highest rates globally, indicating a strong presence of female leadership in domestic settings.
